abstract: The Indian market for comics and graphic novels is booming and there is no better proof of this than the second Comic Convention. An "Express" version will run Oct. 22 and 23 at the World Trade Center in Mumbai.
snippet: The Indian market for comics and graphic novels is booming and there is no better proof of this than the second Comic Convention. An "Express" version will run Oct. 22 and 23 at the World Trade Center in Mumbai.

headline.main: Mumbai Comic Convention Spotlights Local Talent
